entries.name: Martin Casado
entries.notes: General Partner at a16z. Pioneer of Software-Defined Networking (SDN). Founded Nicira (acquired by VMware for $1.26B). PhD Stanford.

entries.name: NDRC
entries.notes: Ireland's national startup accelerator programme, powered by @dogpatchlabs in partnership with @portershed, @RDIhubIreland and @republicofwork. Follows Liam.

entries.name: Sheel Mohnot
entries.notes: Partner @ BTV VC, leading pre/seed rounds of fintech companies

entries.name: Matt Bornstein
entries.notes: Partner @ a16z, AI enthusiast. Investor in Cursor, unconvAI, Character AI, Replicate, Tabulario, and many AI/data companies
